name: A Bug’s Home
description:
A Bug’s Home is a classic simulation game with microscopic vision. Wonderful worm world can bring you to the cheerful rhythm and agitated game against each other .You can transport and snatch supplies to build your own fantastic empire .You will not alone when you build the empire because of Freedom online social networking. Come soon to build your bug’s home!
Features:
●We have beautiful game screen and cute ant.
●You can carve and decorate your own homesteads with freedom.
●It is great to communicate with friends from all over the world.
●Collect all kinds of supplies from your home, other players’ home or Adventure, that will be very interesting.
●The Arena is very crazing, you can get great rewards there.
